name: 5-Minute Baked Potato
description: Looking for a quick and easy meal that melts in your mouth? Try this delicious, no-mess and no-fuss “baked” potato made in just minutes in your steamer. Top with generous amounts of our vegan and gluten-free Better Than Bacon Topper to get that smoky, satisfying bacon flavour that pairs perfectly with the spud. Use plain Greek yogurt instead of mayo for a creamy, low-fat dip to dollop on your potato.

ingredients.name: CCB Dip Mix or 3 Onion Dip Mix
Better Than Bacon Topper or 3 Onion Dip Mix

preparation: Scrub potatoes and pierce several times with a fork. Place in Multipurpose Steamer and microwave for 5–7 min, until easily pierced with a fork.
Combine dip mix with yogurt or mayonnaise and sour cream.
Slice potato across the top and add a dollop of prepared dip and your favourite toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.
